title: The Wall Street Journal: Ernst & Young partner claims company ignored sexual-harassment complaint
text:
A tax partner at Ernst & Young LLP has filed a federal sexual-harassment complaint against the accounting firm, alleging another partner groped and assaulted her in 2015 and that the firm hasnâ€™t taken the matter seriously.
Jessica Casucci, a 14-year employee and a partner since 2014, says her career has been damaged as a result of the harassment by the other partner, John Martinkat, according to the complaint filed Wednesday with the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission.
...
